About Me

I am Nyssael Hermosura, a graduate of Communication Arts who loves to do portrait photography and capture extraodinary things/moments to express my creativity.

“What I like about photographs is that they capture a moment that’s gone forever, impossible to reproduce.”

Karl Lagerfeld
